tasks.title: Design token types
tasks.details:
## Overview
Define all tokens your language needs

### Implementation
Follow the implementation steps in the task description. Start with a minimal working version, then iterate.

### Key Concepts
- Understand the core algorithm before coding
- Handle edge cases explicitly
- Test against reference implementations
- Profile for performance bottlenecks

### Practice
- [ ] Implement from scratch without references
- [ ] Test with edge cases
- [ ] Compare output with established libraries
- [ ] Optimize for production use

### Completion Criteria
- [ ] Code produces correct output
- [ ] Can explain the implementation to others
- [ ] Edge cases handled properly
- [ ] Performance is acceptable
